title: The Battle of Mogadishu (Black Hawk Down)
itunes:title: The Battle of Mogadishu (Black Hawk Down)
description: For this episode, Avery, Codie & Tony journey to Somalia during October 3, 1993 to discuss the Battle of Mogadishu, more popularly known as Black Hawk Down. The guys take on their first modern warfare battle and discuss how the battle still resonates in popular culture and modern memory. Enjoy!
content:encoded: For this episode, Avery, Codie & Tony journey to Somalia during October 3, 1993 to discuss the Battle of Mogadishu, more popularly known as Black Hawk Down. The guys take on their first modern warfare battle and discuss how the battle still resonates in popular culture and modern memory. Enjoy!
